T02D2987:53b-0: @53b * // dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2987:53b-1: 'jig rten bi na ya ka'i gdon las thar bar 'dod pas /
T02D2987:53b-2: sngon du 'jug dus dang mtshan ma shes par bya ste /
T02D2987:53b-3: dmangs rigs kyi lus las dri ma 'byung ba'am /
T02D2987:53b-5: kha zas gzhan gyi lhag ma za ba'i tshe'am /
T02D2987:53b-6: bud med dang dbyes byas pa'i tshe'am /
T02D2987:53b-8: gcer bur gnas pa'i dus sam /
T02D2987:53b-9: mar ngo'i tshes lnga dang bcu bzhi 'am /
T02D2987:53b-11: zhugs pa'i mtshan ma ni mkhun zhing du ba dang /
T02D2987:53b-12: nor rnams chud gson du 'gro ba dang /
T02D2987:53b-13: gzhan gyis yid du mi 'ong ba dang /
T02D2987:53b-14: skyes pa yin na bud med mi rnyed pa dang /
T02D2987:53b-15: bud med yin na skyes pa mi rnyed pa dang /
T02D2987:53b-17: zhing mi skye la gal te bud med rnyed kyang
T02D2987:53b-18: bud med bsam pa 'gyur ba ni log 'dren gyi
T02D2987:53b-20: de las thar pa'i thabs sgrub pa ni /
T02D2987:53b-21: gtor ma'i bum pa bzhi 'bras yos dang /
T02D2987:53b-26: me tog dkar po'i phreng ba dang /
T02D2987:53b-28: spos sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i gtor ma nub tu sbyin te /
T02D2987:53b-38: n'a ga ge sar rnams cha bsnyams la ba'i chu
T02D2987:53b-39: dang ra'i chu dang btags la snga ma bzhin du
T02D2987:53b-40: mar du btsos pa la sogs pa byas la /
T02D2987:53b-41: byugs pa dang bsku ba la sogs pa byas na /
T02D2987:53b-42: log 'dren gyi gdon las nges par thar ro //
